nom.tam.fits

Class UndefinedData

  • java.lang.Object
    • nom.tam.fits.Data
      • nom.tam.fits.UndefinedData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FitsElement

    public class UndefinedData
extends Data
    This class provides a simple holder for data which is not handled by other classes.
